channel.title: IIGB Core on IIGB Bioinformatics Core @ UCR
channel.description: Recent content in IIGB Core on IIGB Bioinformatics Core @ UCR

item.title: IIGB Seminar
item.description: UCR Institute for Integrative Genome Biology hosted a seminar titled “What Can the IIGB Cores Do For You?”. This seminar was presented by Coordinators and staff members in three major cores, discussing services and personnel that are provided to the UCR community: Genomics Core Metabolomics Core Bioinformatics Core Presentation slides for the Bioinformatics Core can be accessed here: Bioinformatics Core
